actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to conduct an inspection of the Buckeye Lake Dam and levee, Buckeye Lake, Ohio, to determine its structural stability.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to inspect the structural stability of the Buckeye Lake Dam and Levee, Ohio, and report any findings and recommendations to Congress and the Ohio Department of Natural Resources.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to conduct an inspection of the Buckeye Lake Dam and levee, Buckeye Lake, Ohio, to determine its structural stability.
